verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁבַֽע־ <S%H7651><s%> she-va'- seven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year לְפֶ֖קַח <S%H6492><s%> le-Fe-kach of Pekah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רְמַלְיָ֑הוּ <S%H7425><s%> re-mal-Ya-hu; of Remaliah מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach began to reign אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz Ahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹתָ֖ם <S%H3147><s%> yo-Tam of Jotham מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim Twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years אָחָ֣ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz [was] Ahaz בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> be-ma-le-Cho, when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> ve-shesh- six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah and did הַיָּשָׁ֗ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar, not [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֛י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֖יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav his God כְּדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> ke-da-Vid like David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. his father

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech walked בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and even אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-No yea and made his son הֶעֱבִ֣יר <S%H5674><s%> he-'e-Vir to pass through בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, the fire כְּתֹֽעֲבוֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> ke-to-'a-Vot according to the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הוֹרִ֤ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> ho-Rish cast out יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh whom the LORD אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיְזַבֵּ֧חַ <S%H2076><s%> vay-zab-Be-ach And he sacrificed וַיְקַטֵּ֛ר <S%H6999><s%> vay-kat-Ter and burnt incense בַּבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> bab-ba-Mot in the high places וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and on הַגְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> hag-ge-va-'ot; and on the hills וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> ra-'a-Nan. and under every green

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh came up רְצִ֣ין <S%H7526><s%> re-Tzin Then Rezin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אֲ֠רָם <S%H758><s%> 'A-rom of Syria וּפֶ֨קַח <S%H6492><s%> u-Fe-kach and Pekah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son רְמַלְיָ֧הוּ <S%H7425><s%> re-mal-Ya-hu of Remaliah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah; to war וַיָּצֻ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6696><s%> vai-ya-Tzu-ru and they besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אָחָ֔ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz, Ahaz וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo but יָכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu but could לְהִלָּחֵֽם׃ <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem. not overcome

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he הֵ֠שִׁיב <S%H7725><s%> He-shiv recovered רְצִ֨ין <S%H7526><s%> re-Tzin Rezin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אֲרָ֤ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram of Syria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֵילַת֙ <S%H359><s%> 'ei-Lat Elath לַֽאֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> la-'a-Ram, Aram וַיְנַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H5394><s%> vay-nash-Shel and drave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְהוּדִ֖ים <S%H3064><s%> hay-hu-Dim the Jews מֵֽאֵיל֑וֹת <S%H359><s%> me-'ei-Lot; from Elath; וַאֲרַמִּים va-'a-ram-mim כוַֽאֲדֹומִים֙ <S%H726><s%> va-'a-do-Mim Syrian קבָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u came אֵילַ֔ת <S%H359><s%> 'ei-Lat, to Elath וַיֵּ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-she-vu and dwelt שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom there unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz So Ahaz מַלְאָכִ֗ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim, messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תִּ֠גְלַת Tig-lat פְּלֶ֤סֶר <S%H8407><s%> pe-Le-ser to Tiglathpileser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-de-Cha I [am] thy servant וּבִנְךָ֖ <S%H1121><s%> u-vin-Cha and thy son אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni; I עֲלֵ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh come up וְהוֹשִׁעֵ֜נִי <S%H3467><s%> ve-ho-shi-'E-ni and save מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> mik-Kaf me out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- of the king אֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram, of Syria וּמִכַּף֙ <S%H3709><s%> u-mik-Kaf and out of the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech of the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַקּוֹמִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> hak-ko-Mim which rise up עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. against

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz And Ahaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef the silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav, and gold הַנִּמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-Tza that was found בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God וּבְאֹֽצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> u-ve-'o-tze-Rot and in the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; of the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach and sent לְמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech- to the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria שֹֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> Sho-chad. [it for] a present

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav against מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur, of Assyria וַיַּעַל֩ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'Al went up מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech unto him for the king אַשּׁ֤וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against דַּמֶּ֙שֶׂק֙ <S%H1834><s%> dam-Me-sek against Damascus וַֽיִּתְפְּשֶׂ֔הָ <S%H8610><s%> vai-yit-pe-Se-ha, and took וַיַּגְלֶ֖הָ <S%H1540><s%> vai-yag-Le-ha it and carried [the people of] it captive קִ֑ירָה <S%H7024><s%> Ki-rah; to Kir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רְצִ֖ין <S%H7526><s%> re-Tzin Rezin הֵמִֽית׃ <S%H4191><s%> he-Mit. and slew

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And king אָחָ֡ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz Ahaz לִ֠קְרַאת <S%H7125><s%> Lik-rat to meet תִּגְלַ֨ת tig-Lat פִּלְאֶ֤סֶר <S%H8407><s%> pil-'E-ser Tiglathpileser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria דּוּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> dum-Me-sek, to Damascus וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach an altar אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּדַמָּ֑שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> be-dam-Ma-sek; that [was] at Damascus וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech and king אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz Ahaz אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אוּרִיָּ֣ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah to Urijah הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּמ֧וּת <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut the fashion הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תַּבְנִית֖וֹ <S%H8403><s%> tav-ni-To and the pattern לְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all מַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Se-hu. of it according to all the workmanship

וַיִּ֛בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven built אוּרִיָּ֥ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah And Urijah הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; an altar כְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after שָׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach had sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech according to all that king אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz Ahaz מִדַּמֶּ֗שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> mid-dam-Me-sek, from Damascus כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken thus עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made אוּרִיָּ֣ה <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah so Urijah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- before בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> Bo came הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech- [it] against king אָחָ֖ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz Ahaz מִדַּמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <S%H1834><s%> mid-dam-Ma-sek. from Damascus

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo was come הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And when the king מִדַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> mid-dam-Me-sek, from Damascus וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; the altar וַיִּקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> vai-yik-Rav approached הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech and the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach to the altar וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al and offered עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and
